title: Online Education Barrier Overcoming and Teaching Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A teaching competency development program optimized for smartphone-based microlearning environments, targeting workplace science education professionals (medical/legal/technical practitioners).

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose technical barriers (internet access, security, etc.) occurring during online education execution with over 80% accuracy
Learners can design 5-minute microlearning content applying student engagement strategies
Learners can develop and apply at least three project-based assessment tools suitable for mobile environments in practical settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
